Plot: At the height of the American Civil War, two young lovers pledge their love and devotion as they plan their future together. Their lives are torn apart and dreams are shattered as tragedy shakes their world to the core.
Title: The Box
Writer: Kimberly B. Davis (screenplay), Melanie Star Scot (screenplay), Elijah Chester (screenplay), Kimberly B. Davis (story)
Actors: David Topp, Taylor-Grace, Elijah Chester, Glennellen Anderson
